alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued November 19 at 7:23PM PST until November 20 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Widespread sub-freezing temperatures 20 to 26 degrees, locally into the upper teens expected. * WHERE...Antelope Valley. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damage to outdoor plumbing possible. Expect severe damage to crops or sensitive vegetation, and harm to unprotected pets or livestock.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
